feed.title: Enclosed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.6.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor(docs): configuration variables as table by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/214
  • feat(i18n): setup crowdin integration by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/215
  • chore(deps): update dependency jsdom to v25.0.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/213
  • chore(actions): added stale action by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/217
  • chore(deps): update dependency esbuild to ^0.24.0 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/212
  • fix(layout) Adjust new note button on mobile by @Zoobdude in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/182
  • refactor(responsive): increased navbar mobile breakpoint by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/225
  • fix(note-viewer): preserve line breaks by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/229

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.6.8...v1.6.9

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(deps): update dependency @solidjs/router to v0.14.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/268
  • chore(deps): update dependency bumpp to v9.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/278
  • chore(deps): update dependency vitepress to v1.4.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/280
  • chore(deps): update dependency pino-pretty to v11.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/279
  • docs(contributors): added contributors image in root readme by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/284
  • Fix Vietnamese language for application title by @kogakisaki in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/288
  • docs(other-platforms): Add other platform placeholders by @Zoobdude in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/290
  • Added Italian language by @archistico in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/291
  • feat(i18n): improved i18n contribution documentation by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/292
  • fix(deps): update dependency picocolors to v1.1.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/289
  • chore(deps): update pnpm to v9.12.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/287
  • chore(deps): update dependency @playwright/test to v1.48.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/277
  • feat(i18n): add Brazilian Portuguese locale by @ceroma in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/298
  • chore(deps): update dependency @cloudflare/workers-types to v4.20241018.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/297
  • fix(deps): update dependency hono to v4.6.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/269
  • chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.81.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/286
  • Update de.json by @Martin511 in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/304

New Contributors

  • @archistico made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/291
  • @ceroma made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/298
  • @Martin511 made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/304

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.8.0...v1.9.0

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(docs): added brand-kit page by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/306
  • docs(other-platforms): Add UmbrelOS app store link by @Zoobdude in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/308
  • feat(i18n): update Simplified Chinese language by @GabrielxDuO in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/310
  • chore(deps): update actions/checkout digest to 11bd719 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/309
  • feat(ci): Add ARMv7 image builds for older RPIs by @Zoobdude in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/312
  • feat(docker): armv7 support by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/316

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.9.1...v1.9.2

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v5.4.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/303
  • fix(deps): update dependency solid-js to v1.9.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/301
  • fix(deps): update unocss monorepo to ^0.64.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/299
  • Update ru.json by @ilyakonovalenko in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/320
  • feat(config): add default note TTL configuration by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/323

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.9.2...v1.10.0

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(i18n): added Hungarian translation (#311) by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/324
  • feat(i18n): added Dutch translations by @SamKr in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/329
  • feat(ui): Improve language dropdown and translation by @YummyBacon5 in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/338
  • feat(docs): added i18n page by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/340
  • feat(config): added the option to create note without expiration by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/341

Updated some deps

  • chore(deps): update pnpm to v9.12.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/318
  • fix(deps): update dependency @hono/node-server to v1.13.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/319
  • chore(deps): update dependency @vitest/coverage-v8 to v2.1.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/313
  • chore(deps): update dependency @iconify-json/tabler to v1.2.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/302
  • fix(deps): update dependency pino to v9.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/281
  • chore(deps): update dependency tsx to v4.19.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/317
  • chore(deps): update dependency @playwright/test to v1.48.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/293
  • fix(deps): update dependency @hono/node-server to v1.13.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/326
  • fix(deps): update dependency ofetch to v1.4.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/272
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v5.4.11 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/325
  • chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.86.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/300

New Contributors

  • @SamKr made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/329

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.10.0...v1.11.0
